General.Name: Digital Imaging Technology INC
General.Industry: Machinery, Tools, Heavy Vehicles, Trains & Ships
General.Description: Digital Imaging Technology, INC. provides vision inspection solutions for display manufacturing process. It offers LCD, AMOLED, and film AOI solutions. The company also provides AOI equipment for auto-glass, solar cell, and X-ray detector industries. Digital Imaging Technology Co., Ltd. was founded in 2005 and is headquartered in Hwaseong, South Korea.
